sentences.en: There are fears that the series could rekindle animosity between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 有人担心这一系列的事情可能会重新引发两国之间的敌意。

sentences.en: He tried to rekindle her attention.
sentences.cn: 他想再去燃起她的情火。

sentences.en: They agonise over what went wrong and how to rekindle the flame.
sentences.cn: 他们愤概于哪里出了错，或者如何去重燃爱火。
